prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Prior to the rise of generative AI, Pavol created the first Czech virtual whiteboard called Collboard and electronic textbooks named H-edu, which were used by tens of thousands of children. He has also worked on scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Generative AI, virtual whiteboard, Collboard, electronic textbooks, H-edu, scientific projects, Czech Ornithological Society
